species.name: archeops
descriptions: Although apparently able to fly, they tended to run along the ground, averaging speeds of roughly 25 mph.
It needs a running start to take off. If Archeops wants to fly, it first needs to run nearly 25 mph, building speed over a course of about 2.5 miles.
It runs better than it flies. It catches prey by running at speeds comparable to those of an automobile.
Said to be an ancestor of bird Pok√©mon, the muscles it uses to flap its wings are still weak, so it needs a long runway in order to take off.
They are intelligent and will cooperate to catch prey. From the ground, they use a running start to take flight.

abilities.name: defeatist
abilities.effect: Halves Attack and Special Attack at 50% max HP or less.
